title: Merge unit tests from XMakeTasksUnitTests into Microsoft.Build.Tasks.UnitTests
body: [This project](https://github.com/Microsoft/msbuild/tree/f1c458f508ff22870d287277f8bf24c967d9cf85/src/XMakeTasks/XMakeTasksUnitTests) should be deprecated and the tests should be moved to [here](https://github.com/Microsoft/msbuild/tree/xplat/src/XMakeTasks/UnitTests)
